Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to military service qualifying for military service credit
Summary: Exempts certain military service credit from being included in calculations of up to three years of military service credit for a public retirement system of the state.
LawCode: Amd ยง1000, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to military service qualifying for military service credit
